entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
